abstract: Did the deserving artists win? Was Aerosmith terrible? The debates rage on our post-awards show.
lead_paragraph: Another year, another mystifying Grammy Awards. The 62nd annual affair, which took place on Sunday night, had the usual retinue of awkward “Grammy moments,” overlong performances and unlikely pairings. But it also was a coronation of a new generation of pop stars — Billie Eilish, who won five trophies, including a sweep of the four biggest categories; Lizzo; Tyler, the Creator and others.
